attributes.action: To take action against a proposal to charge for car parking in Richmond Park
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Access to, and car parking in, Richmond Park has always been free.
To implement car parking charges at this time would seem to be a good way of discouraging people to do the very thing that goverment health advisors and others are attempting to encourage, that is getting people to take more exercise.
A further major potential problem could be  the surrounding roads outside the park  becoming clogged with the vehicles of park visitors

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "take action against a proposal to charge for car parking in Richmond Park."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20500


Prime Minister's Office
